name: Chicken in Space
description: Equipped with nothing more than a jet pack, your goal is to avoid asteroids and other space debris. Luckily, fruit falling into orbit provides the super strength necessary to hurl one asteroid at a time back into another galaxy and get your chicken to the next level of game play. While going through 10 challenging levels, gamers will be blown away with explosive sound effects and realistic graphics. Be careful as debris collisions come your way!
